info.title: API Builder Console API
info.description:
# API Builder Console API
This is the documentation for the API used by [arrow-admin-ui](https://www.npmjs.com/package/arrow-admin-ui)

## Change Log

### 1.0
- Initial Release

get.summary: Gets an array of API group summaries
Gets an array of Endpoints for a group.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: API group to filter by.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of codeblock to retrieve.

get.summary: Lists all the server configuration files.

parameters.name: env
parameters.description: Limit the selection to a single environment.

get.summary: Get the specified server configuration file.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the configuration file.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the configuration file.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The server configuration to save.

get.summary: Gets an array of installed connectors

schema.description: One or more Swagger (OpenAPI) specification documents

put.summary: Validate an endpoint and return it.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Swagger JSON file to validate

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL to Swagger file to validate

parameters.name: swagger

schema.description: One or more Swagger (OpenAPI) specification documents

parameters.description: Swagger document

Location.description: The URL to the newly created endpoint.

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description: Information for endpoint generation.

get.summary: Gets an array of Endpoint summaries.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: API endpoint group to retrieve.

delete.summary: Deletes an endpoint from an API group

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: The API group name.

parameters.name: endpoint

path.description: The specified path to delete from.

parameters.description: The API path to delete a method from.

post.summary: Binds a flow to an endpoint.  The flow will be created and the `flowId` will be calculated by using the `operationId` of the endpoint, or by generating a unique id from the endpoint.  If a flow exists with the same `flowId`, the operation will return 403.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: The API group name.

parameters.name: bind
parameters.description: The Swagger method and path to bind to a flow.

parameters.name: flowId
parameters.description: The unique id of the flow to retrieve.

post.summary: Updates a flow, or creates it if it does not exist.

parameters.name: flowId
parameters.description: The unique id of the flow to update.

parameters.name: flow
parameters.description: The flow to update.

put.summary: Validates a flow and returns a validation response.  The property `valid` indicates whether or not the flow is valid or not.

parameters.name: flow
parameters.description: The flow to validate.

get.summary: Gets an array of LogEntry.  If no records exist, then an empty array is returned.
get.description: The list can be filtered using the expression: field=__field__&op=__op__&value=__value__. Optionally, you can add a logical operation for all expressions, using the form: &lop=AND|OR. By default, the logical operation is AND. Multiple expression filters can be used, specifying field, op, and value for each filter. The field is one of:||value||description|||eq|Equal||ne|Not equal||gt|Greater than||lt|Less than||ge|Greater than or equal||le|Less than or equal||co|Contains|

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search string to filter results.  Matched against all fields.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to return.  Defaults to all.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The record offset

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order by field.  One of: statusCode, method, url, time (default), or duration.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort direction ascending/descending.  One of: asc, desc (default).

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The name of the field on which to filter.  One of: statusCode, method, url, time, or duration.

parameters.name: op
parameters.description: The operation on which to apply to the filter.  See description.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value of the field on which to filter.

parameters.name: lop
parameters.description: The logical operator that applies to all filters.  one of: or, and (default).

get.summary: Gets a list of Arrow Models

parameters.name: definition
parameters.description: Arrow Model definition

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The schema id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The event id.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The details of the API to test.

get.summary: Gets the specification for a particular node handler.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: type of node handler to get the spec from.

get.summary: Gets all specification for registered node handlers.

Status.description: enabled status of the component and whether or not it has any errors

Endpoints.description: One or more Swagger (OpenAPI) specification documents

started.description: The time (in msec) that the request started.

beginServerDuration.description: The time (in msec) processing the message prior to API access.

endServerDuration.description: The time (in msec) processing the message after to API access.

totalDuration.description: The server time (in msec) processing the request.

basicAuth.description: Require authorized access to Arrow Admin APIs
